name: Dark + Shiny Inversion
what_actually_happens: Sheen overwhelms color. Volume ADDS despite black. Black MATTE on apple belly: -0.37 (WORKS). Black SHINY on apple belly: +0.15 (FAILS).

name: Vertical Stripes 3D Curvature Reversal
what_actually_happens: Stripes curve around body, revealing contours instead of elongating. Projection > 2.5": reversed.

name: Horizontal Stripes Help Cases
what_actually_happens: Horizontal at bust HELPS proportion balance. Breaks excessive height. Creates faux curves.

name: Hourglass Sizing Paradox
what_actually_happens: Creates 8-14" waist excess. No single size works.

name: Dark Colors Overweighting for Plus Size
rule_it_breaks: Dark colors for plus size (as primary advice)
what_actually_happens: Overweights color (5th in hierarchy) vs fit/fabric that matter 3-5x more.

name: Structure Worse Than Cling for Hourglass
what_actually_happens: Structure fills concave waist = erases hourglass. Moderate cling is BETTER.

name: Fluid Fabrics Guarantee Belly Cling
what_actually_happens: Fluid at apple belly = guaranteed belly cling. Moderate structure is better.

name: Heavy Fluid Elongation for Petite
who_it_hurts: Petite (reversal: it helps in long garments)
what_actually_happens: Heavy fluid in maxi creates fall lines that elongate. Elongation bonus -0.05 to -0.12.

name: Small Patterns Horizontal Direction for Petite
what_actually_happens: Rule correct for scale, but misses that horizontal is WORST direction for petite.

name: Solid Colors Only for Plus-Size
what_actually_happens: Patterns are fine if scaled proportionally. Blanket ban eliminates self-expression.

name: Hourglass Concave Waist Sheen Reversal
rule_it_breaks: Sheen adds volume at all zones
what_actually_happens: Sheen creates shadow at concave waist = volume REDUCING (-0.03 to -0.08)

name: Concave Zone Cling Override
rule_it_breaks: Normal cling calculation applies to all zones
what_actually_happens: Concave zones gap rather than cling. Returns score -0.10 with status concave_gap.
